cmd='sh;-c;CC="arm-linux-gnueabi-gcc -static-libstdc++" CXX="arm-linux-gnueabi-g++ -static-libstdc++" CPPFLAGS="-O2 -ffast-math -pipe -fomit-frame-pointer  -march=armv7-a -mtune=cortex-a8 -mfpu=neon -mthumb -mfloat-abi=softfp -fno-finite-math-only -fno-stack-protector -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE -fPIC" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-O1 -Wl,--as-needed -static-libstdc++"  /root/koreader/base/thirdparty/libjpeg-turbo/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/libjpeg-turbo-prefix/src/libjpeg-turbo/configure -q --prefix=/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/libjpeg-turbo/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/libjpeg-turbo-prefix/src/libjpeg-turbo-build --host="arm-linux-gnueabi" --disable-static --enable-shared --with-jpeg8'
